name: A Dead End Path On The River Bank In The Deep, Dark Forest
description:
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  The
ancient trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty
roots.  To the south a dark river flows from east to west.  The only exit
appears to be east.

exits.description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.

extra_descriptions.description: The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.

extra_descriptions.keywords: bank banks tree trees trunk trunks
extra_descriptions.description:
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.

The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
